WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for reporting this! The issue has been fixed and can be tried out in the upcoming 0.9.5 release. We also have a beta available (https://typescript.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=TypeScript%200.9.5%20beta) if you'd like to try it out.
WorkItem.Description:
Hy, 

When I try to compile my typescript library (https://github.com/srenault/immutable.ts) with the current typescript 'develop' branch, I'm facing up this error: "Allocation failed - process out of memory".
It's take long time before it throws me up this error. 

Can you help me ?
WorkItem.Summary: Allocation failed - process out of memory

Comments.Message:
Ok, I make my project under Apache 2.0 license.
You can use it to do some tests.

Regards.
Thanks! We should know in the next few days if the fixes we're working on will address this.
